Package org.easybatch.jdbc

This package contains JDBC support classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PreparedStatementProvider
    Callback to prepare the JDBC PreparedStatement with input data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JdbcBatchWriter
    Write a batch of records to a database using the JDBC API.
    JdbcConnectionListener
    Listener that closes a JDBC connection at the end of the job.
    JdbcRecord
    A Record implementation that has ResultSet as payload.
    JdbcRecordMapper
    A RecordMapper that maps database rows to domain objects.
    JdbcRecordReader
    A RecordReader that reads records from a database using JDBC API.
    JdbcRecordWriter
    Write records to a database using the JDBC API.
    JdbcTransactionListener
    Listener that commits a transaction after writing a record.

Package org.easybatch.jdbc Description

This package contains JDBC support classes.
